app_desc.message: Helps with Google® Tag coverage by automatically visiting untagged pages and tracking them via Google® Tag Manager.

intro_upload.message: Please upload a CSV from Google® Tag Manager or Google® Analytics 4. Untagged URLs are filtered automatically.

intro_running.message: The process has started. Depending on the number of URLs and page load times this may take a while.

intro_paused.message: The process is paused. Click "Resume" to continue.

intro_done.message: Done! Check your Google® Tag Manager or Google® Analytics 4 account for current tag coverage and rerun if needed.

intro_idle_ready.message: CSV loaded successfully. Click "Start" to begin.

intro_idle_empty.message: Please upload a CSV (no URL list available).

upload_hint_invalid.message: The uploaded CSV is invalid and/or contains no untagged URLs. Please check and try again.

popup_disclaimer.message: This product is not affiliated with Google® LLC. All trademarks are the property of their respective owners.
